item.title: Coder Help
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_Ge0 0wn3r Ge0
item.description:
@0wn3r_Ge0 wrote:

Hello,My Name Is 0wn3r Ge0 I Made A Server 3 Days Agoâ€¦And I Signed Up On Here And Wondered What I Could Do So I Found A Source (Total time logged in: 3 hours and 21 minutes.) And Wanted To Know How To Get A Coder I Was Thinking People Bribe Coders.
Well If I Could Get A Coder I Will Give The Coder Co-Owner.

Source I Got:Hiyascape But Someone I Dled Source Of Coded It

My Problem: I Do Everything Tut Says Ex:

// Giving the player an unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat] = 2643;
playerEquipment[playerCape] = 6570;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725;
playerEquipment[playerChest] = 2583;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 2585;
playerEquipment[playerHands] = 7457;
playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 7114;
playerEquipment[playerRing] = 773;
playerEquipment[playerArrows] = 892;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4587;

I Tried That Then Saved Compiled And Restarted Server So I Dont No What To Do If You Will Be My Coder Add My Msn Messanger

-Itsmehiphop700@hotmail.com

Thank You.
